paper_abstract: The PRODISTIN Web Site is a web service allowing users to functionally classify genes/proteins from any type of interaction network. The resulting computation provides a classification tree in which (1) genes/proteins are clustered according to the identity of their interaction partners and (2) functional classes are delineated in the tree using the Biological Process Gene Ontology annotations.
paper_title: PRODISTIN Web Site: a tool for the functional classification of proteins from interaction networks
